Joe Shoop is an Independent Product Designer in Seattle who specializes in interface design for screens of all shapes and sizes, and works with people and companies who are making good things.

Here are some of those things:

Blix, iPhone UX & UI, Web Design, Branding
Blue Nile, UX & UI Design for iPhone
ClipCard, Responsive Web, Interface Design
Julep, UX & UI Design for iPhone
Showtime Anytime, UI Design for iPhone & iPad
Starbucks, Illustration, Interface Design
Target. Interface Design for iPhone & iPad, Icon Illustration
